cause.description:
The Sound of America is a concert band and concert chorus comprised of talented high school instrumentalists and vocalists from across the United States of America. Each year, a new group of students are chosen for the annual European Concert Tour which takes place each summer.
The band is directed by Mr. Clyde M. Barr (President of North American Music Festivals), and the chorus will be under the direction of Mr. Randall Yoder. This summer 2008 will be the 32nd annual tour of the Sound of America.
1. Thousands of Smiles, Thousands of Faces, A Million Memories!
cause.mission: To positively develop youth through music and improve international relations.
cause.name: Sound of America Honor Band and Chorus
